Typealiases.html#/s:9DuckSwift16Dispatch.name: DispatchFunction
Typealiases.html#/s:9DuckSwift16Dispatch.abstract: Function type defining stores dispatch function. Used inside Thunk protocol.

Typealiases.html#/s:9DuckSwift8GetStatea.name: GetState
Typealiases.html#/s:9DuckSwift8GetStatea.abstract: Function type that returns some object that conforms to StateProtocol. Used inside Thunk protocol.

Typealiases.html#/s:9DuckSwift7Reducera.name: Reducer
Typealiases.html#/s:9DuckSwift7Reducera.abstract: Function type that is responsible for processing the incoming actions into new State values.

Protocols/StoreProtocol.html#/s:9DuckSwi.name: reducer
Protocols/StoreProtocol.html#/s:9DuckSwi.abstract: Stores Reducer used to determine new value of state.

Protocols/StoreProtocol.html#/s:9DuckSwi.name: dispatch(action:)
Protocols/StoreProtocol.html#/s:9DuckSwi.abstract: Dispatch function is used to pass actions on to reducer and update state property.

Protocols/Middleware.html#/s:9DuckSwift1.name: body(dispatch:state:)
Protocols/Middleware.html#/s:9DuckSwift1.abstract: Function called after Action was dispatched to the Store but before it was processed byt the Reducer.

Protocols.html#/s:9DuckSwift6ActionP.name: Action
Protocols.html#/s:9DuckSwift6ActionP.abstract: Marker protocol which denotes the ability to be dispatched to a store.

Protocols/Middleware.html.name: Middleware
Protocols/Middleware.html.abstract: Protocol that enables users to add extra functionalities to Store class.

Protocols.html#/s:9DuckSwift13StateProto.name: StateProtocol
Protocols.html#/s:9DuckSwift13StateProto.abstract: Marker protocol which denotes the ability of an object to be a state of Application.

Protocols/StoreProtocol.html.name: StoreProtocol
Protocols/StoreProtocol.html.abstract: Defines requirements of Stores. Default implementation of this protocol is the Store class.

Classes/Store.html#/s:9DuckSwift5StoreC7.name: init(reducer:state:middlewares:)
Classes/Store.html#/s:9DuckSwift5StoreC7.abstract: Initializes the store with a reducer function and initial state of the applicaiton.

Classes/Store.html.name: Store
Classes/Store.html.abstract: Store class is the default implementation of StoreProtocol. Store is being initialized with a Reducer and applications initial state.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
